news.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
news.description: OpenAI and NORAD are bringing new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa” with three ChatGPT holiday tools that let families create festive elves, toy coloring pages, and custom Christmas stories.
